io.jeo.vector

Interface Feature

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiffFeature, FeatureWrapper, GeometryTransformFeature, ListFeature, MapFeature, MongoFeature, OGRFeature

    public interface Feature
    An object consisting of a set of named attributes, any of which may be a vector geometry.
    Author:
    Justin Deoliveira, OpenGeo
    See Also:
    MapFeature, ListFeature

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Geometry geometry()
      Geometry of the feature.
      Object get(String key)
      Gets a named attribute of the feature.
      boolean has(String key)
      Check if a feature has an attribute.
      String id()
      Feature identifier.
      Map<String,Object> map()
      Returns an immutable map view of the feature.
      Feature put(Geometry g)
      Sets the geometry of the feature.
      Feature put(String key, Object val)
      Sets a named attribute of the feature.

    • Method Detail

      • id

        String id()
        Feature identifier.

      • has

        boolean has(String key)
        Check if a feature has an attribute. This should return true if the key exists even if the value is null.
        Returns:
        true if the attribute key is present, false otherwise.

      • get

        Object get(String key)
        Gets a named attribute of the feature.

        This method should return null if no such attribute named key exists.

        Parameters:
        key - The key or name of the attribute.
        Returns:
        The attribute value or null.

      • geometry

        Geometry geometry()
        Geometry of the feature.
        Returns:
        a Geometry object, or null if the feature has no geometry.

      • put

        Feature put(String key,
          Object val)
        Sets a named attribute of the feature.
        Parameters:
        key - The key or name of the attribute.
        val - The new value of the attribute.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • put

        Feature put(Geometry g)
        Sets the geometry of the feature.
        Returns:
        This object.

      • map

        Map<String,Object> map()
        Returns an immutable map view of the feature.
